snippet: Friday’s report showed a decline in new jobs, another sign of weakened economic growth, adding pressure on the Federal Reserve to put off raising interest rates.
abstract: Stock market closes up due to expectations that Federal Reserve will wait to raise interest rates due to weak jobs report.
lead_paragraph: Friday’s report showed a decline in new jobs, another sign of weakened economic growth, adding pressure on the Federal Reserve to put off raising interest rates.

headline.main: Market Advances With a Lift From Oil Prices
headline.print_headline: Weak Jobs Data Reassures That Fed Will Be Cautious
